title: Now Pre-leasing !!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'The Jaxon Apartments in Atlanta, GA, offers a relaxing, charming community in a convenient yet desirable location.', 'Experience the perfect balance of tranquil living and close proximity to major employers, shopping, and dining.', 'Our state-of-the-art fitness center offers you the chance to workout steps from your apartment home or take a light jog through our scenic grounds.', 'You can even escape from the heat at one of our three sparkling pools, entertain friends at our pool side grilling station, or play a game of chess or checkers while grilling out poolside.', 'A perfect blend of quality, convenience, and style you do not want to miss.', 'In addition to the community amenities, The Jaxon Apartments offers a variety of one and two-bedroom floor plans sure to meet any need.', 'Choose from a renovated or non-renovated home with amazing view options and great locations.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 22, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Pet Friendly.', 'Deposit:', 'None', 'Leasing options:', '6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'None', 'Application fee:', 'None', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'None', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type:', 'Off-Street', 'Parking notes:', 'None',
